alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 15 at 12:05PM PDT until April 16 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 8 PM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 8 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Drivers on Highway 395 should be prepared for dangerous driving conditions due to sudden strong crosswinds and reduced visibilities due to blowing dust.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
